main event: An unidentified object was reported in West Manchester, Ohio on April 1, 1962, observed by several people for 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The object was seen between 100-200 feet from the ground,The object was yellow-white in color and circular,It was estimated to be 30-40 feet in diameter,No sound, trail, or exhaust was noted during the sighting,The object was initially visible and then appeared to subside to the ground but could not be located afterward.
sighted object: unidentified object estimated to be part of a meteorite
